cleaned_text: & Marketing Consultant Heal stuck dis-eases and trauma with a combination of naturopathic, energy, and spiritual healing. Great conversation with [Inga Joseph](https://au.linkedin.com/in/inga-joseph-16b33421b?trk=public_post-text) about the clients who came for her physical healing but found emotional healing, too. Trauma which goes unaddressed lodges in the body. But it CAN be loosened and the body, mind, and spirit can HEAL! Learn how in the video. Link in comments. Do share your experiences with this in the comments! Please comment, share, like/love/etc. and help get this info out so that others can also reap the benefits of holistic healing. You are a whole person and deserve full healing. [#healing](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fhealing&trk=public_post-text) [#healingtrauma](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fhealingtrauma&trk=public_post-text) It was a pleasure to chat
